channel.title: Comments on: ASP.NET MVC 4 Razor Starter Guide – How to avoid punching your Laptop to Death
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: tim
item.dc:creator: tim
item.description:
Thanks Tahir Khalid for the tutorial.
I received a message which state: "[..] 'Scripts' does not exist in the current context"
At the: Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml
To resolve that, I added the following
to the Web.Config located at in the Folder.
My current IDE and Settings: VS2010 & MCV4
Thanks again.
Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10951669/mvc-4-scripts-does-not-exist
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Tahir Khalid for the tutorial.

I received a message which state:
“[..] ‘Scripts’ does not exist in the current context”

At the: Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml

To resolve that, I added the following

to the Web.Config located at in the Folder.

My current IDE and Settings:
VS2010 & MCV4

Thanks again.

Reference:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10951669/mvc-4-scripts-does-not-exist
